content:
That's wonderful! I'm thrilled to hear that the podcasts have been inspiring you while working on your vase. Listening to art history podcasts can be a great way to spark creativity and gain new insights into different techniques and styles.

It's also fascinating how listening to podcasts can influence your creative process. Sometimes, hearing about the experiences and approaches of other artists can help you see your own work in a new light or encourage you to try new things.

What kind of vase are you working on, by the way? Is it a specific style or technique you're exploring?
